title: Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", ca. 1780
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor (yellow, brown, red, gray), black chalk on paper.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: A variation of 1900-1-12 with a straight upper rim and with moldings framing the panels.  The three of them are decorated with garlands laying over two lion masks each.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor (yellow, brown, red, gray), black chalk on paper.. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1900-1-13.
